document.heading: LGBTQ HOMELESS YOUTH REFORM ACT OF 2013

history.narrative: Law 20-100, the “LGBTQ Homeless Youth Reform Amendment Act of 2014,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-51. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on January 7, 2014, and February 4, 2014, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on February 28, 2014 it was assigned Act No. 20-288 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-100 became effective on May 3, 2014.
